p: For a single AMIP5/CMIP5 model, we cannot solve the decomposed equilibrium heat budget in Eq. 1b since we cannot estimate ΔC O and ΔC R. However, we can make plausible simplifying assumptions to develop two analytical models of differing complexity, which predict regression relationships between the known ∆T, ∆F, ∆F A and ∆F R terms across the AMIP5/CMIP5 ensemble that we can analyse—good agreement would suggest our assumptions are valid, and vice-versa.
